name: The White Book
description:
Look at all those paint pots! There are eighteen different colours to choose from, and one big paint brush – your finger. Pick a colour and, with big finger-brushstrokes, fill your white screen with colour until ... a cheeky animal emerges! There’s a lion roaring in the orange, a pig trotting in the pink, and – ribbit! – a frog hopping around in the green. Just tap the animals to interact with them, play with them, and see what they do next.

ANDERSEN AWARD 2014 - Best Digital Creation.
"Because it is a child-friendly application that’s simple, effective and immediate."

---

THIS IS A MINIBOMBO APP!

• It's simple and intuitive
One single gameplay and no navigation menu for maximum accessibility.
• It takes the right amount of time
A short game sequence full of surprises, suitable for the young users it was designed for.
• It's much more fun if played together
Designed for sharing so that parents can play with even the youngest of children.

---

WHO IS MINIBOMBO?

Minibombo is an Italian publishing house dedicated to little children and the grown-ups who read along with them.

This application is based on a book. Would you like to know more? Then start turning the pages of THE WHITE BOOK and join a little painter as he finds all sort of surprises on a plain white wall!
